codeSystems.name: SNOMEDCTClinicalFindings
codeSystems.title: SNOMED CT Clinical Findings
codeSystems.description: This value set includes all the "Clinical finding" [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) codes - concepts where concept is-a 404684003 (Clinical finding (finding)).

codeSystems.name: BirthSex
codeSystems.title: Birth Sex
codeSystems.description: Codes for assigning sex at birth as specified by the [Office of the National Coordinator for Health IT (ONC)](https://www.healthit.gov/newsroom/about-onc)

codeSystems.name: USCoreSimpleObservationCategory
codeSystems.title: US Core Simple Observation Category
codeSystems.description: Used to classify the context of a survey, screening or assessment for simple observations and may be used to assist with indexing and searching for appropriate instances.

codeSystems.name: USCoreSourceofPaymentValueSet
codeSystems.title: US Core Source of Payment Value Set
codeSystems.description: [US Public Health Data Consortium Source of Payment Codes](https://www.nahdo.org/sites/default/files/2020-12/SourceofPaymentTypologyUsersGuideVersion9.2December2020.pdf) excluding specific payer organizations such as "BLUE CROSS/BLUE SHIELD" and  limited to main categories for classification, type of plan and additional subcategories.

codeSystems.name: UsCoreVitalSigns
codeSystems.title: US Core Vital Signs ValueSet
codeSystems.description: The vital sign codes from the base FHIR and US Core Vital Signs.
